item.description:
@Patrickftw wrote:

…Leech what from smart ass?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: April 08, 2008, 07:42:58 PM[/size][hr]Creating my OWN pc…I came up with a couple ideas…Like blocking off portals so you do it one by one, adding a chest and you click which void piece you want for a certain amount of tickets…So if you’re saying I leeched my pest control you’re wrong. It may not be that good but it’s decent…

item.title: HELP! NPC Drops!
item.dc:creator: @Patrickftw Patrickftw
item.description:
@Patrickftw wrote:

This isn’t a normal NPC drop or I’d just do it…I’m adding PC…and when you kill the portal I want it to add tickets…but it doesn’t =[. I put…

if(npcs[NPCID].npcType == 3777) //final portal
{
int Player = npcs[NPCID].StartKilling;
client ppl = (client) server.playerHandler.players[Player];
ppl.sendMessage("Congratulations! You have won! Take these tickets! ");
ppl.teleportToX = 2657; 
ppl.teleportToY = 2639;
ItemHandler.addItem(620, npcs[NPCID].absX, npcs[NPCID].absY, 1, GetNpcKiller(NPCID), false);
}

620 is the ticket ID…But it doesn’t add it to your inventory…and additem #### doesn’t work either…it gives me an error…any suggestions?

Read full topic
